features.title: League Participation
features.description: Join different leagues and participate in competitive matches.

features.title: Ranking
features.description: View your rank in the league and compare it with other players.

features.title: Challenge Other Players
features.description: Challenge fellow players for matches to improve your ranking.

features.title: Results
features.description: Check your match results and league standings in real-time.

features.title: Group Chat
features.description: Communicate with other players in the league through group chats.

features.title: League Information
features.description: Access detailed information about the league, including schedules and rules.

features.title: Video Links
features.description: Watch tutorial videos to understand league participation and features.

features.title: League Participation

features.title: Ranking
features.description: Monitor your ranking and performance within state leagues.

features.title: Challenge Other Players
features.description: Challenge players from other regions in state leagues to increase your rank.

features.title: League Information
features.description: Stay updated on league rules, schedules, and announcements.

features.title: Academy Listing
features.description: Browse through a list of tennis academies where courts are available for booking.

features.title: Academy Details
features.description: View details of selected academies.

features.title: Select Slots
features.description: Choose available time slots for court bookings based on academy schedules.

features.title: Make Payment
features.description: Securely make payments for court bookings through the app’s integrated payment gateway.

features.title: View Booking History
features.description: Track and manage your past bookings, including date, time, and academy details.

features.title: Booking Details
features.description: Access information about your upcoming bookings, such as location and time.

features.title: Video Links
features.description: Watch instructional videos on how to book courts and manage your bookings.

features.description: Browse through a collection of images and videos related to AITA players.

features.description: Analyze player performance based on various key metrics and statistics.
